headline: Security Best Practices You Should Know

digest_items.title: Use secure random number generation
digest_items.fix: Use crypto.randomBytes() or secrets module, not Math.random()

digest_items.title: Use HSTS headers
digest_items.why: HTTP Strict Transport Security forces browsers to only connect via HTTPS

digest_items.title: Scan for exposed secrets in repos
digest_items.why: Committed secrets can be found by attackers scanning public repositories
digest_items.fix: Use tools like git-secrets or truffleHog to scan commit history

digest_items.title: Verify container image security
digest_items.why: Vulnerable base images introduce security risks to containerized apps
digest_items.fix: Scan images with Trivy or Clair and use minimal base images

digest_items.title: Disable directory listing
digest_items.why: Directory listing exposes file structure and sensitive files
digest_items.fix: Set 'Options -Indexes' in Apache or 'autoindex off' in nginx
